verses.name: 1 Kings 10:19
verses.text: The throne had six steps, and the top of the throne was round behind: and there were stays on either side on the place of the seat, and two lions stood beside the stays.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:20
verses.text: And twelve lions stood there on the one side and on the other upon the six steps: there was not the like made in any kingdom.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:21
verses.text: And all king Solomon’s drinking vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold; none were of silver: it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon.
